subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt needed a late kick to win the 100 meters in 9.91 seconds, edging the former world record-holder Asafa Powell at the Golden Gala in Rome.
snippet: Usain Bolt needed a late kick to win the 100 meters in 9.91 seconds, edging the former world record-holder Asafa Powell at the Golden Gala in Rome.
